config.section.ranges: Random Ranges (Active if Random Mode is ON)
config.section.manual: Manual Fixed Times (Active if Random Mode is OFF)

config.random_mode.desc: If enabled, the sunset time will change dynamically.
config.frequency.name: Frequency
config.frequency.desc: How often the sunset time changes.
config.spring_min.name: Spring: Earliest
config.spring_max.name: Spring: Latest

config.summer_max.name: Summer: Latest
config.fall_min.name: Fall: Earliest
config.fall_max.name: Fall: Latest
config.winter_min.name: Winter: Earliest
config.winter_max.name: Winter: Latest
config.range.desc: The sunset will happen randomly between these two times.
config.manual_spring.name: Spring Fixed Time
config.manual_summer.name: Summer Fixed Time
config.manual_fall.name: Fall Fixed Time
